string-array.name: Settings
string-array.item: Slow Down A, B, C\'s Game

string-array.name: cageclues_description
string-array.item: Certainly didn\'t lose his acting skills
Put it on the backburner and let\'s talk best cage movies
I\'m going to vote for Vampire\'s Kiss
That scene where he runs down the street yelling I\'M A VAMPIRE! I\'M A VAMPIRE! I\'M A VAMPIRE!
have you thought maybe he really is a vampire though?
I mean, the guy really doesn\'t age
Who would be scarier chasing you in a forest: Cage or Shia LaBeouf?
Normally I\'d say Cage, but have you seen this video?
Terrifying. They should do a buddy cop movie together.
OKAY WHAT DID HE LOSE? THINK SHERLOCK
was accused of stealing a chihuahua
okay you should have figured it out by now
okay dummy I\'m giving up on you
